FHIR R4 Core Prototype Implementation Guide - December 2019 Release. Based on FHIR Version 4.0.1
Note: this is an initial prototype specification.

Extension Library

This page lists all the Extensions that have been approved for use with the FHIR Profiles.

  • Extension UK Core NHS Number Verification Status This extension has been constrained to represent the verification status of an NHS number.
  • Extension UK Core NHS Communication This extension has been constrained to support the communication preferences for a resource in the NHS.
  • Extension UK Core Death Notification Status This extension has been constrained to represent a patientâ€™s death notification (as held on Personal Demographics Service (PDS)).
  • Extension UK Core Ethnic Category This extension has been constrained to represent a patient's ethnic category.
  • Extension UK Core Religious Affiliation This extension has been constrained to represent a patient's religious affiliation.
  • Extension UK Core Residential Status This extension has been constrained to represent a patient's residential status.
  • Extension UK Core Treatment Category This extension has been constrained to represent a patient's treatment category.
  • Extension UK Core Nominated Pharmacy This extension has been constrained to represent a patient's nominated pharmacy.
  • Extension UK Core Main Location This extension has been constrained to represent a reference to the main location for an organisation.
  • Extension UK Core Clinical Setting This extension has been constrained to represent the clinical setting of a List.
  • Extension UK Core List Warning Code This extension has been constrained to represent warnings that a list may be incomplete as data has been excluded due to confidentiality or may be missing due to data being in transit.
  • Extension UK Core Admission Method This extension has been constrained to represent the method by which a patient was admitted to hospital.
  • Extension UK Core Encounter transport This extension has been constrained to represent the transport used by the subject for an encounter.
  • Extension UK Core Outcome of Attendance This extension has been constrained to represent the outcome of an Outpatient attendance.
  • Extension UK Core Discharge Method This extension has been constrained to represent the method of discharge from hospital.
  • Extension UK Core Emergency Care Discharge Status This extension has been constrained to represent the status of a patient on discharge from an Emergency Care Department.


    • The following HL7 extensions are also approved for use with the FHIR Profiles.

    • patient-birthPlace
    • patient-birthTime
    • patient-cadavericDonor
    • organization-period
    • coding-sctdescid

    Published by NHS Digital nhsdigital.fhir.r4.core.prototype# based on FHIR 4.0.1 created 2019-12-04.
